A: 1. Which prophecy came to pass with Jesus' birth? (a) Kingdom of God (b) Birth of Jesus (c) Agony
2. Which prophet foretold Jesus' birth? (a) Isaiah (b) Jeremiah (c) Daniel
3. Emmanuel means God is always _ (a) With us (b) Caring (c) Giving life
4. God protects and guides us (a) True (b) False
5. What is the first attribute mentioned? (a) Emmanuel (b) Wonderful (c) Counsellor
6. To serve God, we must ask for His Holy Spirit (a) True (b) False
7. The government shall be upon His _ (a) Hand (b) Head (c) Shoulder
8. And His name shall be called (a) Wonderful, Counselor, Jehovah (b) Wonderful, Counselor, Mighty God (c) Wonderful, Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace
9. The disciples gathered in _ on Pentecost (a) Bethlehem (b) Rome (c) Jerusalem
10. A _ came from the sky (a) Manner (b) Angel (c) Voice
11. Who is the Holy Spirit? (a) God in us (b) God's Father (c) God's Commander
12. Was Jesus the Messiah the Jews expected? (a) True (b) False
13. Worship Him in spirit and in _ (a) Flesh (b) Tongue (c) Truth
14. Was Isaiah's prophecy fulfilled? (a) Yes (b) No
15. Apostles received power to kill enemies after the Holy Spirit (a) True (b) False
16. To be born again means to be _ (a) Reborn (b) Baptized (c) Free from poverty
17. A born again person lives a Christ-like life (a) True (b) False
18. 'I am the way, the truth, and the life' is in (a) John 3:16 (b) Acts 4:12 (c) John 14:6
19. Which disciple asked where Jesus was going? (a) Judas (b) Simon Peter (c) Thomas
20. Jesus is the way to the Father (a) True (b) False
21. We can't see God without believing in Jesus (a) True (b) False
22. One cannot see God except one is _ (a) Big (b) Tall (c) Born again
23. We can become born again by _ (a) Going to church (b) Giving our life to Christ (c) Preaching
24. A good _ looks after sheep (a) Shepherd (b) Sheep (c) Military
25. All are qualities of a good shepherd except _ (a) Kindness (b) Protection (c) Fear
26. Who is a good shepherd? (a) Jesus (b) Thomas (c) Judas
27. 'I am a good shepherd' Who said this? (a) Aboki (b) Jesus (c) Soldier
28. The bread of life is _ (a) Jesus (b) Manna (c) Loaf
29. Jesus gives spiritual satisfaction (a) True (b) False
30. Who said He is the living bread? (a) Peter (b) Paul (c) Jesus
B: Instructions: Answer all questions from this section. (Each question carries 2 marks.)
1. Before _________ ascension, He said He would prepare a place.
2. He warned them to be _________ since no one knows when He would come back.
4. The bread of life is _________ who came from God.
5. Jesus said, 'I am the _________ the _________ and the _________.'
C: Instructions: Answer all the questions from this section (Each question carries 4 marks.)
1. Explain how to prepare for Jesus' second coming.
2. Narrate what we must do to be born again.
4. Explain how Jesus proved to be a Good Shepherd.
5. Explain the meaning of 'Bread of Life'.
